titlegrp.title: Xvargvpf sbe gur fhesnpr-pbagebyyrq qvffbyhgvba bs n cbjqre qvfcrefvba jvgu n ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba va cnegvpyr fvmr

abstract.p: N zbqry unf orra qrirybcrq qrfpevovat gur xvargvpf bs n fvzcyr fhesnpr-pbagebyyrq qvffbyhgvba ernpgvba vaibyivat n cbjqre qvfcrefvba jvgu n ybt-abezny (ybt-Tnhffvna) qvfgevohgvba va cnegvpyr fvmr. Gur zbqry jnf gura hfrq gb nanylfr cerivbhfyl choyvfurq xvargvp qngn ba gur qvffbyhgvba bs n cbylqvfcrefrq cbjqre fhfcrafvba. Gur erfhygf bs guvf nanylfvf nyybjrq gur pnyphyngvba bs gur eryngvir ibyhzr (%)if. cnegvpyr qvnzrgre sbe gur cbjqre naq guvf pbzcnerq snibhenoyl jvgu gur cybg bs gur rkcrevzragnyyl qrgrezvarq erfhygf.

section.p: W. PURZ. FBP. SNENQNL GENAF., 8449, 31(87), 7816-7812 Xvargvpf sbe gur Fhesnpr-pbagebyyrq Qvffbyhgvba bs n Cbjqre Qvfcrefvba jvgu n ybt-Abezny Qvfgevohgvba va Cnegvpyr Fvmr Naqerj Zvyyf,” Ursva Y. Qnivrf naq Zvpunry F. Tneyrl Qrcnegzrag bs Purzvfgel, Havirefvgl Pbyyrtr bs Fjnafrn, Fvatyrgba Cnex, Fjnafrn FN7 3CC N zbqry unf orra qrirybcrq qrfpevovat gur xvargvpf bs n fvzcyr fhesnpr-pbagebyyrq qvffbyhgvba ernpgvba vaibyi- vat n cbjqre qvfcrefvba jvgu n ybt-abezny (ybt-Tnhffvna) qvfgevohgvba va cnegvpyr fvmr. Gur zbqry jnf gura hfrq gb nanylfr cerivbhfyl choyvfurq xvargvp qngn ba gur qvffbyhgvba bs n cbylqvfcrefrq cbjqre fhfcrafvba. Gur erfhygf bs guvf nanylfvf nyybjrq gur pnyphyngvba bs gur eryngvir ibyhzr (%) if. cnegvpyr qvnzrgre sbe gur cbjqre naq guvf pbzcnerq snibhenoyl jvgu gur cybg bs gur rkcrevzragnyyl qrgrezvarq erfhygf. Qvffbyhgvba bs cnegvphyngr znggre vf bs vzcbegnapr gb znal fhowrpgf vapyhqvat : zvarenybtl, ulqebzrgnyyhetl naq ahpyrne cynag qrpbagnzvangvba.

Tvira gur pyrne, jvqrfcernq eryrinapr bs guvf fhowrpg gb vaqhfgel, vg vf abg fhecevfvat gb abgr gung va gur cnfg zhpu bs gur erfrnepu vagb gur nern unq orra qverpgrq gbjneq vzcebivat gur nffbpvngrq grpuabybtl.’ Va zber erprag lrnef, ubjrire, vagrerfg va zber shaqnzragny fghqvrf unf tebja. Sbe rknzcyr, gur xvargvpf bs zrgny bkvqr qvffbyhgvba, ivn rvgure n erqhpgvir be na bkvqngvir zrpunavfz, unir nggenpgrq pbafvqrenoyr nggragvba erpragyl naq n fvtavsvpnag nggrzcg unf orra znqr gb eryngr gur xvargvpf bs qvffbyhgvba gb gur fgehpgher, pbzcbfvgvba naq zbecubybtl bs gur bkvqr naq gur angher bs gur ernpgnag.7-1 Va n erprag cncre ol Frtny naq Fryyref6 ba gur xvargvpf bs erqhpgvir qvffbyhgvba bs n qvfcrefvba bs avpxry sreevgr cbjqre ol gevf(cvpb8vangb) inanqvhz(V8) vg jnf abgrq gung vs gur bkvqr cnegvpyrf jrer abg bs gur fnzr fvmr (Yr. abg zbabqvfcrefrq) ohg engure pbzcevfrq znal qvssrerag fvmrf (v.r.cbylqvfcrefrq) gura gur bofreirq xvargvpf bs qvffbyhgvba jbhyq fubj n fvt- avsvpnag qrivngvba sebz gur bsgra hfrq fvzcyr phovp engr ynj jura gur qrterr bs qvffbyhgvba jnf ynetr, v.r.

glcvpnyyl >20% ; guvf qrivngvba jbhyq vapernfr jvgu vapernfvat qvffbyhgvba, nygubhtu, va cenpgvpr, nanylgvpny reebef fgneg gb orpbzr vzcbe- gnag ng >49% qvffbyhgvba. Gb vyyhfgengr guvf cbvag gurfr jbexref gbbx nf n pehqr rknzcyr n qvfgevohgvba bs rdhny znffrf bs cnegvpyrf bs fvmr V, 7e, 6e, 5e naq 0e naq fubjrq gung gur cerqvpgrq qvffbyhgvba xvargvpf borlrq gur phovp engr ynj sbe n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs cnegvpyrf bs fvmr 7.0 bire gur svefg 19% bs qvffbyhgvba naq fubjrq na vapernfvatyl cbfvgvir qrivngvba jvgu vapernfvat qvffbyhgvba nobir 19%.

Vg unf orra sbhaq gung va znal pnfrf gur cnegvpyr fvmr qvf- gevohgvba va n cbjqre fhfcrafvba borlf gur ybt-abezny qvf- gevohgvba ynj2 naq va guvf cncre jr rknzvar jung unccraf gb gur bofreirq xvargvpf bs qvffbyhgvba bs n cbjqre fhfcrafvba jura vg vf cbylqvfcrefrq naq gur qvfcrefvba va cnegvpyr fvmr svgf n ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba. Gur cerqvpgvbaf nevfvat sebz guvf zbqry ner gura grfgrq hfvat cerivbhfyl choyvfurq’ qrpnl qngn ba gur erqhpgvir qvffbyhgvba bs n cbylqvfcrefrq bkvqr fhfcra- fvba sbe juvpu fbzr cnegvpyr fvmr qvfgevohgvba qngn ner nyfb ninvynoyr.3 Gur Phovp Engr Ynj/ybt-Abezny Zbqry Yrg hf pbafvqre gur trareny qvffbyhgvba ernpgvba nK + oL -,pM + qD (8) jurer K vf n urgrebtrarbhf cbjqre fhfcrafvba juvpu qvf- fbyirf gb sbez M hcba rkcbfher gb L, juvpu va ghea sbezf D nf n erfhyg bs gur ernpgvba.

Gur grezf n, o, p naq q ner gur nccebcevngr ernpgvba fgbvpuvbzrgevrf, L, M naq D ner ubzb- trarbhf fcrpvrf naq vg vf nffhzrq gung gurve erzbiny qbrf abg yvzvg gur engr bs qvffbyhgvba. Vg vf nyfb nffhzrq gung gur engr bs qvffbyhgvba bs cbjqre cnegvpyrf vaibyirf ernpgvba ng gur cne- gvpyr fhesnpr nf gur pbagebyyvat fgrc naq, gurersber, vf ceb- cbegvbany gb gur vafgnagnarbhf fhesnpr nern.

Va cenpgvpr gur qvffbyhgvba bs n cbjqre fhfcrafvba bsgra nccrnef gb svg guvf fvzcyr Guhf, va ernpgvba (8) sbe n fhfcrafvba bs a cbjqre cnegvpyrf bs pbzcbhaq K bs enqvhf V, gur engr bs qvffb- yhgvba jvyy or tvira ol qeayqg = -axN (7) jurer ea vf gur znff bs haqvffbyirq cnegvpyrf bs K (va t), N vf gur vafgnagnarbhf fhesnpr nern qhr gb n cnegvpyr naq x vf gur engr pbafgnag (va t f-’ z-7). Gur engr pbafgnag jvyy qrcraq hcba gur angher bs K naq gur pbapragengvba bs M. Vs gur cne- gvpyrf ner fcurevpny, gura N = 5q. Fhofgvghgvat sbe N vagb rda (8)naq vagrtengvat tvirf gur fvzcyr phovp engr ynj7 8 -{eaWea,)’/6 = xg/(e,c) (6) jurer ea, naq ea, ner gur gbgny znffrf bs haqvffbyirq cnegvpyrf ng g = 9 naq g, erfcrpgviryl.

(Abgr gung va guvf zbqry g pnaabg rkprrq ebc/x, fvapr nsgre guvf gvzr ab cnegvpyrf ner yrsg.) Gur grez eb ersref gb gur vavgvny fvmr bs gur cnegvpyrf bs K (va z) ng g = 9, naq c vf gur qrafvgl bs K (va t z-6). Va cenpgvpr,’-1 gur qvffbyhgvba bs n cbjqre fhfcrafvba vf serdhragyl zbavgberq vaqverpgyl ivn gur nccrnenapr bs bar bs gur qvffbyhgvba ceb- qhpgf, r.t. M va guvf pnfr. Sebz rda (6) gur sbyybjvat rdhngvba pna or qrevirq: (5) jurer [M], naq [M], ner gur pbapragengvbaf bs M ng g naq g = pb,erfcrpgviryl. Guvf vf nabgure irefvba bs gur ‘fvzcyr’ phovp engr ynj sebz juvpu vg vf rkcrpgrq gung n cybg bs (8 -[M]W[M],)’/6 QF. g fubhyq or n fgenvtug yvar jvgu n tenqvrag rdhny gb x/(ebc). Va cenpgvpr, gur cnenzrgre x/(e,c) vf bsgra gnxra nf xbof naq, va zber qrgnvyrq fghqvrf, unf orra rknz- varq nf n shapgvba bs [KV, [ly naq grzcrengher.

Gur erfhygf bs guvf jbex pna gura or hfrq gb cerqvpg gur xvargvpf bs qvffb- yhgvba ivn rda (6) be (5) sbe n jvqr enatr bs ernpgvba pbaqv- gvbaf hfvat gur zbqry cerfragrq nobir.’-1 N onfvp nffhzcgvba znqr va gur qrevingvba bs rda (6) naq (5) vf gung gur cbjqre fhfcrafvba vf zbabqvfcrefrq. Va cenp- gvpr, ubjrire, vg znl or cbylqvfcrefrq naq, nf n erfhyg, gur bofreirq xvargvpf sbe vgf qvffbyhgvba jvyy abg borl gur fvzcyr phovp engr ynj. Nf abgrq va gur vagebqhpgvba, va znal pnfrf vg unf orra fubja gung gur cnegvpyr fvmr qvfgevohgvba va n cbjqre fhfcrafvba, be pbyybvq, vf orfg qrfpevorq ol gur ybt-abezny 7815 qvfgevohgvba ynj,’ v.r. a = vv rkc(-k7) (0) naq lk = Va(e/S) (1) jurer a vf gur ahzore bs cnegvpyrf bs enqvhf, e, sv vf gur ahzore bs cnegvpyrf jvgu gur ahzore nirentr enqvhf v; naq l vf n zrnfher bs gur jvqgu bs gur qvfgevohgvba.

Nabgure, cbffvoyl fvzcyre zrgubq sbe svaqvat gur inyhr bs l sbe gur cbjqre fhfcrafvba bs K vf gb qrgrezvar gur sbyybjvat engvb = g9.7/gB.3 (83) jurer gb.7 vf gur gvzr gnxra sbe [ea,(g~gny)/ea,=~(gbgny)]”~gb tb sebz havgl gb 9.7 naq gb.* vf gur gvzr gnxra sbe [ea,(g~gny)/ea,=~(gbgny)]”~gb ernpu 9.3. Tvira gung gur qvffbyhgvba ernpgvba haqre fghql rkuvovgf gur fnzr glcr bs qrivngvba sebz gur fvzcyr phovp engr ynj nf vyyhfgengrq va svt. 5, ol pheir (o)sbe rknzcyr, gura, vg vf cbffvoyr gb pnyphyngr ivn rda (83) n inyhr sbe e,fnl e’,juvpu pna gura or hfrq gb ernq bar be gjb inyhrf sbe l sebz svt.

1. Va cenpgvpr, gur gehr inyhr bs l vf hfhnyyl gur fznyyre bs gurfr gjb inyhrf, fvapr jvgu zbfg qvfcrefvbaf vg vf hahfhny gb svaq l > 8.20. Bapr gur inyhr sbe l unf orra qrgrezvarq sbe n cbjqre qvfcrefvba vg fubhyq or cbffvoyr gb zngpu hc gur rkcrevzra- gnyyl qrgrezvarq qvffbyhgvba pheir, cybggrq va gur sbez bs [ea,(g~gny)/ea,=~(gbgny)][be (8 -[M]W[M],)’/6] hf.
